name: Red
background: Lives with her mother near the woods; tasked to care for her ailing grandmother
motivation: To help her grandmother and prove her maturity; later, to protect her loved ones and resolve the conflict with the Wolf

name: The Wolf
traits: Charming, cunning, conflicted, capable of affection, persuasive
background: A clever forest predator drawn to people by curiosity and hunger; has a reputation for causing trouble among villagers
motivation: Initially driven by hunger and curiosity about Red; later, by growing affection for Red and desire for acceptance

name: Grandmother
background: Elderly woman living alone in a cottage on the edge of the woods; recently ill
motivation: To recover her health and be reunited safely with Red; to protect her granddaughter

name: Red’s Mother
background: Responsible parent, experienced in the dangers of the woods; entrusts Red with an important task
motivation: To ensure her mother’s well-being and teach Red responsibility while keeping her safe

name: Woodsman
background: Local woodsman accustomed to protecting villagers from forest dangers; familiar with Wolf’s reputation
motivation: To defend the villagers and Red’s family from the Wolf; later, to uphold justice and trust Red’s judgment
